Text: Real options conference programs UCLA July find attached the programs for the two backtwoback conferences on real options at UCLA you may also download them from wwwrealoptionsorg and wwwrogroupcom The two conferences are separate but complementary events The first conference cosponsored with Accenture and Morgan Stanley Dean Witter on July is a professional conference on Real Options Valuation in the Connected Economy High Tech Pharma Energy Corporate Valuation StrategicPortfolio Management For information and online registration see wwwrogroupcom The second is the th Annual International Conference on Real Options Theory Meets Practice the annual industry event where academics and practitioners get together to share the latest developments on theory and applications coorganized with The Anderson School at UCLA on July For information and online registration see wwwrealoptionsorg Between the two complementary events we are pleased to present an extensive array of practitioner and cuttingedge academic presentations sharing of experiences by corporate executives and panel discussions by experts from leading organizations and universities Our keynote speaker this year will be Eduardo S Schwartz of UCLA Interested participants must register for the conference online wwwrealoptions org and indicate hotel preferences by May or ASAP We look forward to seeing you at this exciting event and would appreciate if you share this with interested colleagues Lenos Trigeorgis thmanagerialconferenceJulydoc thacademicconferenceJulydoc
